contentrichtext.text: '''Eric Harris''' may refer to: * [[Eric Harris (American football)]] (1955–2012), NFL player * [[Eric W. Harris]] (1916–2007), businessman and Louisiana state Jaycees founder * [[Eric Harris (musician)]], American drummer * [[Eric David Harris]] (1981–1999), teen gunman in the Columbine High School massacre * [[Eric Harris (rugby league)]] (born 1910), rugby league player of the 1920s and '30s for Western Suburbs and Leeds * [[Eric Harris (athlete)]] (born 1991), American sprinter {{hndis|Harris Eric}}
